planet.name: WASP-78 b
2MASS J04150149-2206591 b
TYC 5889-271-1 b
GSC 05889-00271 b
planet.description: WASP-78b is a highly bloated Jupiter-mass exoplanet. It is orbiting an F-type star and was discovered analyzed using WASP, TRAPPIST and CORALIE data. It is one of the hottest known exoplanet with an equilibtrium temperatur of 2350 degrees Kelvin.
